title: I just had someone ban my champion in champ select.
body:
Please don't do this to anyone. You don't know if they're even comfortable playing whatever it is you're asking for. I would like Riot to please implement a report system in champ select or maybe allow 1-2 dodges a day so we aren't forced to lose LP when things like this happen. 

P.S. My friend dodged for me because I'm in my promos. Bless her heart <3

replies.body:
When this happens, hover or lock in Garen and type "Mid or feed".

100% chance the scrub that intentionally banned your pick will eject.

100% chance all 4 other members of the team wouldn't appreciate that.

It also defeats the purpose of winning if they call your bluff.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TMrAOLXE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-03-04T02:27:29.282+0000)
>
> 100% chance all 4 other members of the team wouldn't appreciate that.
> 
> It also defeats the purpose of winning if they call your bluff.

Then you just carry.

Nobody expects DEMACIAAAAA

So, it's what I call "The Yasuo Factor".

When Yasuo is on the enemy team, he is OP.

When Yasuo is on YOUR team, he inevitably feeds.

So, you're sick of Yasuo

So you ban him.

You can ban any champ. Even if one of your team-mates wants to play him.

Yeah, it's a jerk move - but it's also a knee-jerk reaction. Humans are funny like that. Repition is the mother of learning.

In this case though I had hovered Soraka support and he had time to type in the chat "support pick tank" then right after, he bans Soraka. I would understand if he didn't see who I picked or if the person I was playing was someone on everyone's pick or ban list, but he actually had time to think about it before he did it.

Okay, yeah, that's kind of a dick move. :\

It sounds like he just wanted you to play a tank. 

Shoulda picked Nami! lol

Sorry you had to deal with a jerk. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
